venue.name: Evergreen at the Tall Grass Golf Course and Country Club

item.description: Jon us for another All Day Scrapbook Event at the Tall Grass Golf Course and Country Club on Sunday, April 3, 2011 from 9 a.m. through 7 p.m.  $40 will include a light breakfast and a catered dinner or add lunch for an additional $5!  Fully stocked Memory Works vendor table will be available!  Tool table, Cricut machines, raffles, contests, classes and more!  Email me today for more information and a registration form at jocahill@optonline.net.  Hope you can join the fun!
item.name: All Day 10 hour Scrapbook CROP! Register Today!
